job.name: Support_Vector_Regression
job.description: Support vector regression are supervised learning models with associated learning algorithms that analyze data used for regression.

task.name: Support_Vector_Regression
task.description:
C: float Penalty parameter C of the error term.
KERNEL: string Specifies the kernel type to be used in the algorithm. It must be one of Ã¢ÂÂlinearÃ¢ÂÂ, Ã¢ÂÂpolyÃ¢ÂÂ, Ã¢ÂÂrbfÃ¢ÂÂ, Ã¢ÂÂsigmoidÃ¢ÂÂ, Ã¢ÂÂprecomputedÃ¢ÂÂ or a callable.
EPSILON: float It specifies the epsilon-tube within which no penalty is associated in the training loss function with points predicted within a distance epsilon from the actual value.

script.code:
C = float(variables.get("C")) KERNEL = variables.get("KERNEL") EPSILON = float(variables.get("EPSILON"))
variables.put("C_PARA", C) variables.put("KERNEL_PARA", KERNEL) variables.put("EPSILON_PARA", EPSILON) variables.put("ALGORITHM_NAME", "SupportVectorRegression") variables.put("SUPERVISED_ALGORITHM", "True") variables.put("REGRESSION_MEASURE", "True")
